items.title: UC Davis Receives $120M Gift
items.summary: The largest donation ever to veterinary medicine! This transformative gift will fund new research facilities, endowed professorships, and student scholarships.

items.title: Cornell Public Health Fellowship
items.summary: Cornell announces a new full-tuition fellowship for students pursuing public health degrees, expanding access to One Health training.

items.title: Texas A&M Zoonotic Research
items.summary: Epidemiologist studies diseases that jump between animals and humans â€” critical work for pandemic preparedness.

items.title: Texas A&M McAllen Facility
items.summary: New Rio Grande Valley campus brings veterinary education to an underserved region, training the next generation of food animal vets.

items.title: Penn Vet Working Dog Center
items.summary: CBS Philadelphia features Penn's groundbreaking canine cancer detection research with working dogs.

items.title: Tufts Bovine Breeding Lab
items.summary: Theriogenology Club and Student Livestock Organization host hands-on bovine breeding training for vet students.
